title: Brickhead Zombie

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Cast off the brick on your head, becoming 2579: Buckethead Zombie.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: > At any point you may choose a role to appear as to investigatives (you paint the bricks that obscure your face).

fields.name: > After being attacked once, you will transform into 2579:

desc:
Post 2581
*After consultation with various storybook wolves, it was determined that straw helmets and wood helmets were not up to snuff, and that brick helmets had to be seriously considered.*
